title: Mastery Project

embed.description: Soon, Champions mastery from League of Legends. Animations belongs to Riot Games. https://www.facebook.com/Pucsres https://twitter.com/PucsRes

body: I'm just wondering if anyone has any information on when the **Mastery Project** will be Updated with new Levels and Rewards! I've put a link in showing some **Mastery ranks** that were in the **PBE** before release of the **Mastery Project**

replies.body: Talked to Riot about it, they simply said if there not out yet then they are not ready yet
like the zed chroma? how hard can it be to swap the colours on a model?
Really hard, it's not like people on reddit had it done on several skins as soon as chromas were even announced. (at most, it takes 1 person like 1 day to make a really good looking chroma.)

my point exactly, which completely negates the point "if its not out yet then it isn't ready"

because its been on the pbe for months.
